name: ext-auth-jwt
description: JWT helpers pinned under arch/crypto plus JOSE JWS compact sign/verify and JWK thumbprints (RS256/ES256/Ed25519/EdDSA).
docs:
Ed25519 + JWT helpers pinned by arch/crypto contracts, plus JOSE JWS compact sign/verify and JWK thumbprints.

Modules:
- std.crypto.ed25519
- std.auth.jwt
- std.auth.jwt.tests
- std.auth.jose_jws_v1
- std.auth.jose_jws_v1.tests
- std.auth.pkce
- std.auth.pkce.tests

Worlds:
- run-os / run-os-sandboxed only

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-auth-jwt@0.1.4
- Use std.auth.jwt.sign_from_arch_v1 / verify_from_arch_v1 with profiles under arch/crypto.
- Use std.auth.jose_jws_v1.jws_compact_sign_v1 / jws_compact_verify_v1 for JWS compact sign/verify with JWK inputs.
- Use std.auth.jose_jws_v1.jwk_thumbprint_sha256_b64u_v1 for RFC7638 JWK thumbprints.
- Use std.auth.pkce.pkce_s256_challenge_v1 for PKCE S256 code_challenge generation.
